Summary: two objects appeared for approx. 8 mins. then one bject appeared for 10-15 secs. then 5 mins. later 2 objectets appeared for 30 secs. several degrees east.
divs: sighting detailsthe objects were present in the sky, about 15degrees above the horizon southwest of maricopr, az. i went out for my nightly walk at 9:45 p.m. mst and immediately noticed two kite shaped objects in the southwest sky. i watched as i walked. the 2 were visible for approx 8 mins. they went off like a light switch being turned off. then a couple mins. later, one object appeared for 10-15 secs. about 2 degrees east of the first two objects. about 5 mins. later, two objects appeared abut 15 degrees east of the second object. it reained visible for approx 30 secs. anyone driving west on i-8 west of casaz grande, az. at that time would have seen them. the objects were, as i said, kite shaped with a cross typical of a kite sopport. thr lights were red, green, and yellow. there were approx. 10 lights to each object. i know there is a military area s\w of here, but flares generally "burn" out, not go out like a light switch being turned off. also, all flares i saw while in the military, burned white, not colored. i was at my residence when i saw the objects. they stood out in the sky. i thought it was a christmas decoration. the object were stationary at all times, not sinking as a flare would. by the time i went and got my truck keys to get my camera, the objecs were gone. i stayed out for 35 more mins. and saw no more.
